image.altText: Politicians and supporters celebrate outside Legislative Council.

props.synopsis: A $1.13 billion stadium on the edge of the Hobart CBD has been approved by Tasmania's upper house and will be built, satisfying a key condition for the state's AFL licence.

image.altText: Tasmania AFL licence press conference

props.synopsis: When it comes to the Macquarie Point stadium in Tasmania, there is clearly something deeper at play than seats, concrete and a roof. You simply couldn't vote for it otherwise, writes Chris Rowbottom.

title.children: Tasmania isn't quite done with having awkward conversations with the AFL

image.altText: People stand and photograph a bushfire in the distance.

image.altText: A crowd of people marching with banners and signs calling for an end to native forest logging in Tasmania.

image.altText: A woman holds up a glass container with small fishes inside, her face seen through the glass and water

image.altText: Marc Pfister, Christian Haller, Alan Frei and Enrico Pfister hug

props.synopsis: The idea of the Philippines curling team reaching the Winter Olympics has a hint of Cool Runnings about it, while one team member, Alan Frei, has more than a suggestion of Eddie the Eagle. But at the heart of this story is a genuine sporting fairytale that is one step away from becoming an Olympic legend.

title.children: Curling's most unlikely fairytale on the cusp of Olympic spot

image.altText: Men in uniiform hand lifejackets to other men on a boat moored on orange sand.

title.children: Chinese nationals discovered in remote WA as ABF launch investigation

image.altText: Christine Mann standing smiling in front of a leafy green tree.

props.synopsis: A lack of access to clean clothes and sheets led to high rates of heart disease in this outback Queensland town. But an Indigenous-led washing initiative is changing health outcomes in the region.

title.children: From 99 to 15 cases: How outback region reduced preventable disease

image.altText: Two men shake hands in front of an airplane on the tarmac of an airport

image.altText: A male teacher standing in a science classroom speaking to five male students in front of a white board.

props.synopsis: Nationally, there is a teacher shortage and one of the measures used to fill the gap is using undergraduates, but that too can have long-lasting impacts.

title.children: Why high school teachers are getting younger and younger

image.altText: Two conjoined PNG twins wearing yellow beanies lie in a small hospital crib.
